text: Machchafushi is one of the uninhabited islands of Alif Dhaal Atoll, Maldives. It is the setting for the Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives resort, which is one of the 11 5-star properties run by Centara Hotels and Resorts. ==References== Category:Uninhabited islands of the Maldives Category:Resorts in the Maldives
title: Machchafushi
